responses: 0: Yes. All parties except the state-sponsored party (and closely allied parties) are banned.
1: Yes. Elections are non-partisan or there are no officially recognized parties.
3: Yes. But only a few parties are banned.
4: No. No parties are officially banned.
citation: Pemstein et al. (2018, V-Dem Working Paper Series 2018:21); V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
question: Are any parties banned?
name: v2psparban, *_osp, *_ord
